duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain cleanliness and safety of rooms, patient care areas, offices, hallways, and other assigned areas.
Remove soiled linen and waste from assigned area.
Clean and maintain hard floor surfaces, including dust mop, wet mop, strip, wax, and polish.
Clean and maintain carpeted floors, including vacuuming, shampooing, and extracting.
Clean and sanitize fittings, furniture, walls, ceilings, and vents.
Clean inside glass in assigned area.
Follow appropriate security measures when cleaning medication rooms and refrigerators, and understand the need for medication inventory control and security.
Utilize tools, equipment, and supplies to obtain maximum efficiency and safety.
Demonstrate knowledge of the safe and proper use of housekeeping equipment.
Handle cleaning chemicals in a safe and economical manner, using protective equipment when necessary.
Demonstrate proper care and maintenance of equipment and report damaged or dangerous equipment to supervisor.
Assist with conference room set-ups as required.
Complete all job assignments per scheduled requirements efficiently and safely.
Inform supervisor/lead if schedule is completed or if a block of time becomes available for other tasks.
Communicate effectively, openly, and respectfully to all customers.
Establish open and appropriate communication with customers, co-workers, and supervisors.
Report any unsafe conditions found in work area to the appropriate supervisor.
Participate in educational programs and in-service meetings.
